definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: Sicily is Europe, Africa and Asia on one island.
sentences.chinese: 西西里岛处在一个欧洲，非洲和亚洲交界处。

sentences.english: Sicily is located just southwest of the Italian mainland and it's the largest Mediterranean island.
sentences.chinese: 西西里岛卧降于意大利东北部，是地中海最大的岛屿。

sentences.english: In northeastern Sicily you'll find lush forests.
sentences.chinese: 在西西里岛东北部，你会发现茂密的森林。

sentences.english: Felt throughout Sicily and north to Naples and Campobasso.
sentences.chinese: 认为整个西西里岛和北那不勒斯和坎帕巴索。

sentences.english: Sicily's coasts are gold with orange and lemon orchards.
sentences.chinese: 西西里岛的海岸与橙色和柠檬黄金果园。

sentences.english: They landed on the Italian island of Sicily in July of nineteen forty-three.
sentences.chinese: 他们降落在七月一九四三年在意大利西西里岛。

sentences.english: Lava heads for the sea as Mount Etna erupts Wednesday night on Sicily.
sentences.chinese: 西西里岛上的埃特纳火山星期三爆发，岩浆奔流入海。

sentences.english: Rome pushed the Carthaginians from Sicily.
sentences.chinese: 罗马先将迦太基人赶出西西里岛。

sentences.english: Sicilians are serious about their puppets.
sentences.chinese: 西西里岛人对他们的木偶剧十分认真。

sentences.english: The campaign to put Prince Edmund on the throne of Sicily was one such cause.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个就是把艾德蒙伯爵送上西西里岛王位的运动。

sentences.english: The island of Sicily and the peninsula are shining lights of the city nightlife.
sentences.chinese: 西西里岛的岛屿和半岛都闪烁着城市夜生活灯光。

sentences.english: Lyla:I think you should move to Sicily because you are late for work every day.
sentences.chinese: 我看你也应该搬到西西里岛，你每次上班都迟到。

sentences.english: He died at Gela, Sicily, in 456 BCE.
sentences.chinese: 西元前456年，他死于西西里岛南端的小城吉拉。

sentences.english: Lava flows from Mount Etna's Valle del Bove, on the island of Sicily.
sentences.chinese: 熔岩从西西里岛埃特纳火山的瓦尔德博韦流出。

sentences.english: The end of the 19th century represented the Primavera Siciliana.
sentences.chinese: 十九世纪末代表了西西里岛最繁华的时期。

sentences.english: A group of wealthy friends are cruising the sea near Sicily on a yacht.
sentences.chinese: 一群有钱人开着游艇在西西里岛附近的海上游弋。

definition: Corsica (Island located west of Italy and southeast of France)
Brittany or Bretagne, area of western France
